001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.R;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.controller.ScoresFragment;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.databinding.FragmentScoresBinding;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.databinding.ItemScoresBinding;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
015import java.text.DateFormat;
016import java.time.LocalDateTime;
017import java.time.ZoneId;
018import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
019import java.time.format.FormatStyle;
020import java.util.List;
021
022/**
023 * This class is an adapter for scores and extends ArrayAdapter
024 */
025public class ScoresAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<GameResult> {
026
027  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
028  private final String durationFormat;
029  private final DateTimeFormatter timeStampFormat;
030
031  /**
032   * This adapter inflates and formats the duration and timestamp on the scores page.
033   * @param context context
034   * @param scores List<GameResult> scores
035   */
036  public ScoresAdapter(@NonNull Context context, List<GameResult> scores) {
037    super(context, R.layout.fragment_scores, scores);
038    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
039    durationFormat = context.getString(R.string.duration_format);
040    timeStampFormat = DateTimeFormatter.ofLocalizedDateTime(FormatStyle.SHORT);
041  }
042
043  @NonNull
044  @Override
045  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
046    GameResult score = getItem(position);
047    ItemScoresBinding binding = (convertView != null)
048        ? ItemScoresBinding.bind(convertView)
049        : ItemScoresBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false);
050    binding.leagueSize.setText(String.valueOf(score.getSize()));
051    int ms = (int) score.getDuration().toMillis();
052    double seconds = ms / 1000D;
053    int minutes = (int) (seconds / 60);
054    seconds %= 60;
055    int hours = minutes / 60;
056    minutes %= 60;
057    binding.duration.setText(String.format(durationFormat, hours, minutes, seconds));
058    binding.numberOfGuesses.setText(String.valueOf(score.getGuessCount()));
059    LocalDateTime time = LocalDateTime.ofInstant(score.getTimestamp(), ZoneId.systemDefault());
060    binding.timestamp.setText(timeStampFormat.format(time));
061    return binding.getRoot();
062  }
063}
